Assessment.QuestionText: You want to export the report of order details generated from the <font face="courier new">Orders</font> table in PDF format? Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
. . .
CrystalReportViewer crvOrdersList = new CrystalReportViewer();
SqlDataAdapter sqldaOrders = new SqlDataAdapter("SELECT * FROM Orders", sqlconOrders);
ReportDocument rdOrdersReport = new ReportDocument();
rdOrdersReport.Load(@"D:\Windows Forms\OrderReport.rpt");
DataSet dsetOrders = new DataSet();
sqldaOrders.Fill(dsetOrders, "Orders");
rdOrdersReport.SetDataSource(dsetOrders);
crvOrdersList.ReportSource = rdOrdersReport;
crvOrdersList.ExportReport();
